name: Llama Park #8
description: Meet NeonBoss, the slickest llama in Llama Park! Rocking a black cap and laser eyes that shoot fiery beams, this tan-skinned boy llama struts in a suit and tie against a city skyline. An ENTJ with street smarts, skilling at drewing, he rules the urban jungle with swagger. 'Zap puff puff!' he boasts, lighting up the night, but spits with a smirk when challenged. His bold charisma and city vibe make him the parkâ€™s nightlife king!
